termsContent:
1. To get the bonus, you must make a deposit of at least 30 EUR or the same value in other currencies.
2. The maximum bonus amount is 100% of the deposit amount, but not more than 100 EUR or the same value in other currencies.
3. Bonus code: "**saturdaysport**"
4. The deposit bonus is valid for 6 days, starting from the date you receive it.
5. Full wagering requires making bets 5 times the amount of the bonus  received:(deposit bonus) Ã— 5 
6. Each Combo bet must contain 3 or more events, combo odds 1.4 - 2.4;
subtitle: 100% bonus up to 100 EUR on Saturday
title: Saturday Sport Reload Bonus
description:
Enjoy your weekend on a high note with Win.Casino! Grabbing yourself a 100% bonus up to 100 EUR is easy:

1. Make a deposit of at least 30 EUR.
2. Use the bonus code "**saturdaysport"** to activate reload bonus!
3. Instantly receive a bonus worth 100% of the amount you deposited (up to a maximum of 100 EUR)
